snippet: LEAD: Amid signs that a far-reaching environmental measure on the California ballot is faltering, three national leaders of the environmental movement declared today that the state faced an environmental crisis. They announced the start of a door-...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Amid signs that a far-reaching environmental measure on the California ballot is faltering, three national leaders of the environmental movement declared today that the state faced an environmental crisis. They announced the start of a door-to-door drive for the measure.

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to The New York Times
